Features

Everything you need

A complete toolkit for understanding and improving your estate plan.

Process

How it works

Four simple steps to a comprehensive estate plan analysis.

1

Answer questions

Tell us about your family, assets, and estate planning goals.

2

Get your analysis

We identify gaps, conflicts, and potential issues in your plan.

3

Review distribution

See exactly how your assets will flow to beneficiaries.

4

Generate documents

Create draft documents tailored to your state's laws.
